about_the_game:
Welcome to "Lost Islands" - a life and death test for explorers!

In 1598, at the peak of the Age of Discovery, explorers rushed towards unknown seas like a tide, dreaming of wealth, glory and the wonders of the new world. But in a corner of East Asia, there is a "Lost Islands" hidden in legend, shrouded in eternal storms and mysterious mists. Countless adventurers embarked on the journey with greed and courage, but never returned. Today, you have the opportunity to step into this forbidden land in person and face unknown challenges!

Core gameplay

    "Lost Islands" is a hard-core survival game that combines action-adventure, multiplayer combat and confrontation, BOSS RUSH, and elements similar to "Escape from Tarkov". On this mysterious island, you need to cooperate with your teammates to face countless unknown enemies, cunning forces, and strange natural forces, and find opportunities to escape amid numerous challenges.

● Action combat and multiplayer battles

    When exploring the island, you will encounter various powerful enemies and BOSS battles. Each battle will test your combat skills and reactions. By teaming up with friends to fight together, you can divide work and cooperate, make flexible use of character skills, and face more ferocious enemies together.

● BOSS RUSH CHALLENGE

    Get ready for the crazy challenges of BOSS RUSH mode! In Lost Islands, you will face a series of powerful BOSSs, each with unique skills and combat mechanisms. Defeat them and you will have the opportunity to obtain valuable rare equipment and resources!

● Hardcore survival: death is losing everything

    Lost Islands combines survival with strategy. Similar to Escape from Tarkov, dying will cause you to lose all items and loot you didn't bring back to the safe zone. Every attack is full of risks and uncertainties, which makes every adventure full of excitement and the temptation of high rewards.

● Equipment BUILD and free matching

    Players can collect, build, and upgrade a variety of equipment, and freely match weapons, armor, and combat skills to create a combat build that suits their own style (currently four weapons are available: double swords, long swords, fighting knives, and sword shields). Whether you are a berserker with melee attacks, a shooter with long-range precision strikes, or a supporter who focuses on team support, you can find a way to survive on the island that suits you.

● Open exploration and dynamic tasks

    The island map is full of unknown and random events. You will encounter randomly generated enemies, resource points, and dynamic tasks. At the same time, the dynamic relationship between island forces will also affect the difficulty and rewards of tasks, making every exploration of yours full of freshness.

● PvPvE melee

Players not only need to face powerful monsters, but also be careful of other hostile players. The resources on the island are limited and the competition is fierce. How to complete the mission and survive with the loot under the threat of hostile players will be the biggest challenge. In this lost land, dangers abound, the road home is long and uncertain, but glory and wealth are just around the corner - do you dare to meet this test?

Power relations on the island

    On the Lost Islands, the three major forces are hostile to each other and check and balance each other——

    The Immortals are formed by the souls alienated by the energy of the island.

    The judges are committed to using the cruel environment and the unique resources of the island to strengthen themselves and gain the right to rule the island.

    Baochuanzhai is composed of Ming Dynasty maritime explorers who have drifted to the island and are obsessed with finding a way back to the Ming Dynasty.

    Each force has its own story and secrets behind it. Players can choose to help or fight against them to survive in the unpredictable force struggle.

Can you uncover the truth about the Lost Islands?

    In this extreme survival challenge, players not only have to face unknown enemies and dangerous environments, but also need to find the secrets behind the Lost Islands in endless exploration. Whether it's glory, treasure, or the hope of returning home, everything will depend on your every decision in this mysterious land.

    Are you ready? Join "Lost Islands", use your wisdom and courage to challenge the limits, and uncover the ultimate truth of this mysterious island!

Dear player:

    We're the team behind Lost Islands, and we're excited to have the opportunity to share this journey with you. Our team members mainly come from another STEAM game "Tiger Knight" . It was "Tiger Knight" that introduced us to the STEAM platform and the UE engine, thus opening up the path to developing multiplayer online action games. After another 6 years of development efforts, our new game "Lost Islands" is finally ready to meet you.

    Although we know that our experience and abilities still have many shortcomings, we always have a dream, which is to develop a multiplayer online action game that everyone can really enjoy. Over the years, we have experienced many difficulties and challenges that were once unimaginable, but we have not given up and have been exploring and making breakthroughs, hoping to bring you a fun gaming experience.

    "Lost Islands" may still have many shortcomings, and we also used some mall resources in development, but this is already the second multiplayer online action game from our studio. We try our best to use limited resources to create an interesting and playable work, and hope that every player can find their own happiness in it.

    We will maintain sufficient update frequency and continue to enrich the game content. We hope that as time goes by, "Lost Islands" can be made more perfect. During this process, I sincerely hope to receive your suggestions and feedback. Whether you like it or have an opinion about it, please feel free to speak up in the community. We will do our best to listen, improve seriously, and strive to make the game better and better.

    Thank you for choosing and experiencing our games, thank you for your company and support.

    Looking forward to meeting you in "Lost Islands"!

——"Lost Island" development team

content_descriptors.notes: Gameplay consists of graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict, weapons and depictions of human injury and death.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 46 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 支持机械硬盘（HDD），推荐使用固态硬盘（SSD）。
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 5800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 支持机械硬盘（HDD），推荐使用固态硬盘（SSD）。

short_description: Lost Islands is a Cold Weapon PvPvE online multiplayer action game. You will play an adventurer to an unknown island, killing and co-operating with monsters and other adventurers on the island, embarking on an exciting adventure and eventually escaping with the treasure.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
